books.name: Technical Analysis of the Financial Markets
books.author: John J. Murphy
books.notes: Disponible en impreso, pdf y kindle. Tiene una guía de estudio aparte.
books.quote: Trading system development is part art, part science, and part common sense. Our goal IS NOT to develop a system that achieves the highest returns using historical data, but to formulate a sound concept that has performed reasonably well in the past and can be expected to continue to perform reasonably well in the future.

books.name: Volumen Profile, The Insider's Guide to Trading
books.author: Trader Dale
